    • Method Detail

      • preventDamageCall

        public static boolean preventDamageCall(Towny plugin,
                                        org.bukkit.entity.Entity attacker,
                                        org.bukkit.entity.Entity defender)
        Tests the attacker against defender to see if we need to cancel the damage event due to world PvP, Plot PvP or Friendly Fire settings. Only allow a Wolves owner to cause it damage, and residents with destroy permissions to damage passive animals and villagers while in a town.
        Parameters:
        plugin - - Reference to Towny
        attacker - - Entity attacking the Defender
        defender - - Entity defending from the Attacker
        Returns:
        true if we should cancel.

      • preventDamageCall

        public static boolean preventDamageCall(Towny plugin,
                                        TownyWorld world,
                                        org.bukkit.entity.Entity attackingEntity,
                                        org.bukkit.entity.Entity defendingEntity,
                                        org.bukkit.entity.Player attackingPlayer,
                                        org.bukkit.entity.Player defendingPlayer)
                                 throws NotRegisteredException
        Tests the attacker against defender to see if we need to cancel the damage event due to world PvP, Plot PvP or Friendly Fire settings. Only allow a Wolves owner to cause it damage, and residents with destroy permissions to damage passive animals and villagers while in a town.
        Parameters:
        plugin - - Reference to Towny
        world - - World in which DamageCall was issued
        attackingEntity - - Entity attacking
        defendingEntity - - Entity defending
        attackingPlayer - - Player attacking
        defendingPlayer - - Player defending
        Returns:
        true if we should cancel.
        Throws:
        NotRegisteredException - - Generic NotRegisteredException

      • preventPvP

        public static boolean preventPvP(TownyWorld world,
                                 TownBlock townBlock)
        Is PvP disabled in this TownBlock?
        Parameters:
        townBlock - - TownBlock to check
        world - - World to check if TownBlock is NULL
        Returns:
        true if PvP is disallowed

        Parameters:
